content: From the 26th to the 28th of September 2015, nine people from five countries gathered in Brno (Czech Republic) to have fun together learning and using the Toki Pona language. In this video they are in a university botanical garden and talk about what they see.
translations: ita:Dal 26 al 28 settembre 2015, nove persone provenienti da cinque Paesi si sono riunite a Brno (Repubblica Ceca) per diver
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
